name: Lavender Laboratories
description:
A relaxing sequel to Doctor Voldritch's Experiment intended to help get you nice and chill with hypnosis. The game is for people new and old to hypnotism and gives a tutorial for those not familiar with it. 

The story:

You meet up in a café with Dr. Voldritch who promises you that you'll have a really fun time with a behavioral experiment he's running. He brings you back to his lab where you run into some odd characters and weird hijinks ensue...

…of course you also get to chill with the esteemed Doctor and go to comfy town too.

----

The web version runs a bit slower depending on your computer/internet so there's always the downloadable options. Playtime is about an hour - 2 hours. 

Made by me and with help with my friend Chef.
